page.title: 18FIRE STATION,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: Llangollen Fire Station has{12 staff.} They have{one long fire engine and{one landrover fire engine.}They use the landrover for going to {mountain fires}and places where the other one can't reach.The type of calls they get are for chimney fires, house fires, factory fires and mountain fires. It takes{6 months}to become a proper fire man. Every fire man carries a{personal receiver}it bleeps when there is a fire. The{Head {Office}is in{Rhyl,}it sends a signal which goes to the bleepers. A fire engine can carry{400 to 500 gallons}of water at once. It costs around{Â£20,000 a year to run the fire station. Llangollen is a{part time}fire Station. Every year they have approximately{300 calls.}The fire chief lives locally and is a school governor.
